title: Flag Sark
description: A flag representing Sark, a self-governing British Crown Dependency in the Channel Islands. It's often used to denote Sark, its culture, or national pride.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the Sark flag emoji presents a clean and detailed representation of its heraldic design, complete with smooth gradients and a subtle 3D effect that gives it a polished, tactile quality. The distinct symbols and colors are rendered with precision, embodying the unique identity and heritage of Sark. On Apple devices, this emoji is a direct and clear way to represent the Bailiwick of Guernsey's island of Sark, perfect for discussions related to geography, travel, or personal connection to the location.
